headline: Chevron Corporation (CVX) Announces the Submission of Its Bid to Explore Natural Gas in Four Offshore Blocks in Greece
summary: Chevron Corporation (NYSE:CVX) is one of the 15 Best Stocks to Invest in for Financial Stability. On September 10, 2025, Chevron Corporation (NYSE:CVX) announced the submission of its bid to explore natural gas in four offshore blocks in Greece, in partnership with Hellenic Energy. Chevron Corporation (NYSE:CVX)’s bid targets areas off the Peloponnese peninsula and […]
